description:
Everyone loves a good word search & we have updated the popular Palm Pre version to High Definition for your TouchPad! Word Search is a great time waster for the kids on a long drive or a distraction for you during a boring meeting. Featuring more than 20 categories and more than 5000 words to search for. Each puzzle is uniquely generated from our large vocabulary list so you can play it over and over again. To customize the game you can choose from various puzzles from a light Kids sized to a Expert puzzle. Want to make it easier? Make it only Up and Across. Want to make it more challenging? Choose diagonal and backwards only. English words a breeze? Try our Japanese Hiragana or Greek puzzle on for size. We even feature French and Spanish vocabulary. You can use the TouchPads standard gestures to make it easier to find and select words. Save your games and play them later. Word Search by Invasive Bamboo has it all. Invasive Bamboo is committed to updating the categories and adding fresh word lists periodically. Fall in love with your TouchPad all over again! Play Word Search today!

* Update to include searching, minor enhancements
